title: Reading poetry: haiku
creator_credit: John Mattias, Arthur G. Evans and Oxford Films (U.S.)
brief_description: Teaches language structure, reading and writing of poetry. Presents three haiku with mood scenes of nature and young children playing as background for the reading of poetry. Shows the basic structure of three lines, totalling 17 syllables.
